description: This Dart file defines constants for the 'notes' database table and a 'Note' class representing a note entity, including methods for database serialization/deserialization, copying, and timestamp handling.

classes.name: NoteFields
classes.description: Contains constants defining the database table name and column names for the 'notes' table.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Represents a note with properties such as id, title, content, favorite status, and timestamps. Provides methods for constructing from database maps, converting to maps, copying with modifications, and setting timestamps.

methods.name: Note.fromDbMap
methods.description: Factory constructor to create a Note instance from a database record map.

methods.name: Note.toDbMap
methods.description: Converts the Note instance into a map suitable for database insertion or update.

methods.name: Note.copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the Note with optional modified fields.

methods.name: Note.withTimestampsNow
methods.description: Returns a new Note instance with current timestamps for creation and update.
